transArray.content:
live for the second time
Quiet and suitable for catching up on sleep
Breakfast is until 12:00 noon, it is better to go a little earlier to have more food
The service is pretty good, except for the man who cooks wonton rice noodles, it’s like he’s rewarding you for eating.
I hope the sanitation of the room can be more detailed
High cost performance, complete facilities, relaxed atmosphere, surpassing some traditional express hotels. Recommended
